tool_description: Converts synthesized audio between different formats, bitrates, and compression settings for various delivery platforms and applications.

input_audio.description: Base64 encoded audio data to convert

output_format.description: Target audio format: wav, mp3, ogg, flac, or aac

bitrate.description: Audio bitrate in kbps for compressed formats

error_messages: Unsupported output format: Use wav, mp3, ogg, flac, or aac.
Invalid bitrate: Bitrate must be between 32 and 320 kbps.
Invalid sample rate: Use standard sample rates (8000, 16000, 22050, 44100, 48000).
Conversion failed: Unable to convert audio to specified format.
usage: Provide input_audio and output_format. Optionally set bitrate and sample_rate for format-specific optimization. Returns converted audio in specified format.

converted_audio.description: Base64 encoded audio in target format

file_size_bytes.description: Size of converted audio file in bytes
